parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Object speed (in km/h). Returns relative speed of given object along Y axis. An equivalent to:<br><br><tt>3.6 * ([[velocityModelSpace]] _obj [[select]] 1)</tt>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''speed''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[speed]] _truck1 >= 100) [[then]] {[[hint]] "You're going too fast!"};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[velocity]], [[setVelocity]], [[velocityModelSpace]], [[setVelocityModelSpace]], [[setVelocityTransformation]], [[limitSpeed]]
</value></part></template>
